Title: 豆芽炖豆腐的做法
Setups: 1.<div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4">原料：自发黄豆芽&nbsp; 豆腐 花椒粉&nbsp; 酱油&nbsp; 盐&nbsp; 葱末&nbsp; 姜末</font></div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4"></font>&nbsp;</div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4">做法：1、准备所有材料</font></div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </font></div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2、锅中倒入适量豆油</font></div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4"></font>&nbsp;</div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 3、油开后放入葱姜末炒香。</font><div>&nbsp;</div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4、放入豆芽翻炒。</font></div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4"></font>&nbsp;</div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 5、放入花椒及酱油继续翻炒。</font></div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4"></font>&nbsp;</div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 6、倒入适量水，并放入盐。<div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4"></font>&nbsp;</div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 7、将豆腐直接切块入锅中。</font></div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4"></font>&nbsp;</div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 8、炖至汤汁减少即可出锅。</font></div><div>&nbsp;</div><div><div><font face="楷体_GB2312" size="4">注：这款菜，精盐可以同豆腐一起入锅，有利于豆腐入味。</font></div></div></font></div></div>
